key.dialog.tiers.title: Tier Levels
key.dialog.tiers.content:
If you click on the tier levels or check marks, all ships at the tier level will be selected or deselected.

While the normal tier levels are described with Roman numerals, super ships are marked with a â˜….
key.dialog.nations.title: Nations
key.dialog.nations.content:
When you click on the flags or check boxes you will select or deselect the nations ships.

: Japan

: United States

: Soviet Union

: Germany

: United Kingdom

: France

: Pan Asia

: Italy

: Commonwealth

: Pan America

: Europe

: Netherlands

key.dialog.types.title: Ship classes
key.dialog.types.content:
If you click on the ship classes or check boxes, all ships of the class will be selected or deselected.

Here is the explanation of the class abbreviations:

SS: Submarine (SS)

DD: Destroyer (DD)

CL: Light Cruiser (CL)

CA: Heavy Cruiser (CA)

BC: Battlecruiser (BC)

BB: Battleship (BB)

CV: Aircraft carrier (CV)
key.dialog.pathnotes.title: Whats new?
key.dialog.pathnotes.content:
Version: 1.0.6-13.5:

- By logging in you can automatically select all the ships you have

- Premium and research ships can be filtered now.

- The random function considers all ships equally

- Added daily changing backgrounds

- BB IX Xuan Wu was added

- DD VIII Zhu Que was added
key.dialog.teamkrado.title: Who is Teamkrado?
key.dialog.teamkrado.content:
Teamkrado is an official contributor for World of Warships. In the streams and videos, Krado is the "camera" for the viewers.
Occasionally, Nere, another member of Teamkrado, is also the peephole into the game world.
Also involved are Krom and Blackchi, the latter plays with Krado Hunt Showdown and War Thunder.
In World of Warships or War Thunder, Krado lets his community go along as long as there are spots available in the division.

Teamkrado can be watched here:

Youtube channel

Twitch channel

Instagram Account

Facebook Account

key.dialog.swbattleships.title: Universe of Battleships
key.dialog.swbattleships.content:
Universe of Battleships is my attempt to develop a game that combines the game style of World of Warships with various Sci-Fi universes. The game is a fan game and in not connected with official trademarks and can therefore only be played in private once it is finished...

The Universes i plan to built in: Star Wars, Star Trek, Halo, Stargate, Transformers and an own idea.
key.dialog.rawedit.title: RAWEdit
key.dialog.rawedit.content: RAWEdit is a modification for the strategy game Star Wars: Empire at War. The mod has replaced or expanded almost everything from the original game and added a bunch of new units. The new update for the mod currently needs a while ;).
key.dialog.unitseditor.title: Units Editor
key.dialog.unitseditor.content: The Units Editor is a useful tool for modding Star Wars: Empire at War.
